title: Flash Bites: a few short, short stories
description: Check out the latest trend in reading: short, short stories for your phone, tablet or eReader!Like to read, but don't have the time for a novel? Then Flash Bites: a few short, short stories is for you!These thought-provoking short stories pack an emotional punch. From sci-fi, romance to action, these six stories can each be read in snack-sized bites of 10 minutes or less, and may just leave you inspired.Escape from your smartphone and zoom in an electric unimobile in Freedom! Be swept off your feet, with a twist, in a quest to find Mr. Right in List for Love. Explore a Day in the Life of a Canadian dollar coin. Journey through the ethics of small town mechanic in The Missing Part. Get some action in the spy thriller Day Job. And read what daily life will be like in Domestic Bliss: 2022.For less than your morning coffee, make your day a happy one with these bites of flash fiction.
author: Krista Bunskoek
